targets.query: SELECT sum("Reads_persec") FROM "cluster_csv_filesystem" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$hostname$/ AND "instance" =~ /^$csv_volume$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "instance" fill(none)
SELECT sum("Reads_persec") FROM "cluster_csv_fs" WHERE ("instance" =~ /^$csv_volume$/ AND "host" =~ /^$hostname$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "instance"
SELECT "Reads_persec", "Writes_persec" AS "Writes" FROM "cluster_csv_fs" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$hostname$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "instance", "host"
SELECT sum("Reads_persec") FROM "cluster_csv_fs" WHERE ("instance" =~ /^$csv_volume$/ AND "host" =~ /^$hostname$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "instance"
SELECT "Reads_persec", "Writes_persec" AS "Writes" FROM "cluster_csv_fs" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$hostname$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "instance", "host"
SELECT sum("Reads_persec"), sum("Writes_persec") FROM "cluster_csv_fs" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s)
SELECT max("Disk_Transfers_persec") FROM "win_diskio" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$hostname$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s), "instance", "host"
SELECT sum("Disk_Transfers_persec") FROM "win_diskio" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s)
SELECT max("Disk_Transfers_persec") FROM "win_diskio" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$hostname$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s), "instance", "host"
SELECT sum("Disk_Transfers_persec") FROM "win_diskio" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$hostname$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s)
SELECT max("Avg._Disk_sec/Transfer") FROM "win_diskio" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$hostname$/ AND "instance" =~ /^27|28|29|30|31|32/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s), "instance", "host"
SELECT max("Avg._Disk_sec/Transfer") FROM "win_diskio" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$hostname$/ AND "instance" =~ /^27|28|29|30|31|32/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s), "instance", "host"
SELECT "Disk_Transfers_persec" FROM "win_diskio" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$hostname$/ AND "instance" > '2') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "instance", "host"
SELECT "Disk_Transfers_persec" FROM "win_diskio" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$hostname$/ AND "instance" > '2') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "instance", "host"
SELECT mean("Reads_persec") FROM "cluster_csv_fs" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$hostname$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s), "instance"
SELECT "Disk_Transfers_persec" FROM "win_diskio" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$hostname$/ AND "instance" > '2') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "instance", "host"
SELECT last("Dirty_Bytes") FROM "Storage_Spaces_Drt" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$hostname$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "instance", "host" fill(none)
SELECT last("Dirty_Bytes") FROM "Storage_Spaces_Drt" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$hostname$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "instance", "host" fill(none)
SELECT last("Dirty_Bytes") FROM "Storage_Spaces_Drt" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$hostname$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "instance", "host" fill(none)

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "win_system" WITH KEY = "clustername"
list.name: Cluster
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "win_system" WITH KEY = "clustername"

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "win_system" WITH KEY = "host"
list.label: Host
list.name: hostname
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "win_system" WITH KEY = "host"

list.label: Cluster Volume
list.name: csv_volume
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "cluster_csv_filesystem" WITH KEY = "instance" WHERE host =~ /$hostname/

list.label: Virtual Machine
list.name: virtual_machine
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "hyperv_vid" WITH KEY = "instance" WHERE "host" =~ /^$hostname$/

list.label: VM Disk
list.name: vm_disk
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "hyperv_storage" WITH KEY = "instance" WHERE "host" =~ /^$hostname$/

list.label: Virtual Switch
list.name: virtual_switch
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "hyperv_vswitch" WITH KEY = "instance" WHERE host =~ /$hostname/
